title: The Wisdom of a 3rd Grade Dropout Will Leave You SPEECHLESS | Dr. Rick Rigsby
itunes:title: The Wisdom of a 3rd Grade Dropout Will Leave You SPEECHLESS | Dr. Rick Rigsby
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
Dr. Rick Rigsby, author, award winning professor, and internationally acclaimed speaker, delivers one of the best motivational speeches you will ever hear. 

Inspired? Get Rigsby's book, Third Grade Dropout: https://amzn.to/3NUbuCi



Speaker:


Rick Rigsby: https://www.instagram.com/drrickrigsby/


Music:


Epidemic Sound
